img.div: We're a tuition-free college-preparatory school preparing central Phoenix youth to succeed in college.

h2.h3: Empower College Prep Charter School of Phoenix Arizona

p.span: We are dedicated to providing a superior education to all students that empowers them to obtain an acceptance letter to a university, scholarships to help pay for it, and a plan of what they want to study to empower themselves to change their world.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-round button-medium button-green button-1
